footer.title: Join us!

mission.title: Our mission
mission.sub_title: BOOM's three-fold mission is to power the next generation of fully on-chain games, drive mainstream adoption of the Internet Computer blockchain, and provide a collaborative hub for all things web3 gaming.

card_1.title: Foster Collaboration in the On-Chain Gaming Community
card_1.text: We are building an all-in-one collaborative hub where anyone involved in on-chain gaming can contribute and reap the benefits, whether they're a gamer, builder, developer, guild, investor, partner, or other stakeholder.

card_2.title: Foster Collaboration in the On-Chain Gaming Community
card_2.text: We are building an all-in-one collaborative hub where anyone involved in on-chain gaming can contribute and reap the benefits, whether they're a gamer, builder, developer, guild, investor, partner, or other stakeholder.

guilds.title: Game guilds
guilds.text_1: Are you ready to join a thriving community of passionate individuals? Look no further than our guilds section!
guilds.text_2: With a constantly increasing number of members, you'll be part of a dynamic and vibrant community that's always growing.
guilds.text_3: And the best part? Joining is just a click away! Simply hit the registration button and become a part of something truly special..
